SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameActions, HeartBeatHandler, Remote
public class Server extends Object implements HeartBeatHandler, GameActions
The class represents the server to which clients connect.

      username - the username of the player.
      frontId - the identification of the front of the card.
      backId - the identification of the back of the card.
      side - the selected side of the card.
      position - the selected position to place the card.
